gsw_content_information.article:
Boost specific results for a search using result improvement rules linked to a search profile.
  1. Edit the search profile that you want to create a result improvement rule for.
  2. In the Result Improvement Rules related list, click Create.
  3. On the AI Search Results Improvement Rule form, fill in the fields.
    Label
    Unique label for the result improvement rule.
    Start Date
    First date on which the rule can activate. If left empty, uses current date.
    End Date
    Late date on which the rule can activate. If left empty, uses 30 days from Start Date.
    Activate on all queries
    Option to activate the rule for every search query that satisfies its date and language constraints.
    Language
    Limits activation to search queries in the selected language. Leave empty to activate for searches in any language.
    Expand Synonyms For Query Conditions
    Option to enable expansion of Query condition arguments using synonyms defined in the same search profile and with the same language.
    Triggers
    List of filters describing conditions for activating the rule. This field appears only when Activate on all queries is deselected.
  4. Click Submit.
  5. In the Actions related list, click Create Boost Action.
  6. On the Rule - Action Mapping form, fill in the fields.
    Label
    Unique label for this boost action.
    Order
    Numeric evaluation order for boost actions. Actions with lower order values occur first.
    Boost Type
    Type of boost the action applies.
    • Boost All Documents in Search Source: Applies boost to every search result from the selected search source.
    • Boost by User Context (dynamic): Applies boost to search results from the selected search source if their value for the selected field matches a specified element from the dynamically populated user context.
    • Boost by Field Match (static): Applies boost to search results from the selected search source if their value for the selected field matches a specified static value.
    Search Source
    Name of a search source linked to the search profile.
    Boost Weight
    Numeric amount to add to relevancy scores for boosted search result documents.
    When
    Name of a field found in documents from the selected search source. This field appears only when Boost by User Context (dynamic) or Boost by Field Match (static) is selected from Boost Type. â€‹
    Matches the Searcher's
    Dynamically populated value from user context to compare with search result field value. This field appears only when Boost by User Context (dynamic) is selected from Boost Type.
    Contains
    Static value to compare with search result field value. This field appears only when Boost by Field Match (static) is selected from Boost Type.
  7. Click Submit.
gsw_content_information.title: Boost search result documents
